Name: Arsenal Shock
About the game: Arsenal Shock - First person arena shooter. Out now. COMBAT: Blending fast-paced first person shooter combat with ruthless enemies in diverse and challenging levels environments, Arsenal Shock pins the player in a mayhem-fueled fighting arena. Use a variety of dual weapons to fight off endless waves of enemies that get harder and harder. A score system always adds up total score at the end of each round. ARENA MODE: 9 diverse levels including: Egypt, Gladiator arena, Hell, Mayan, Scifi, Nuclear, Arctic, Village and Bounce. Use bounce pads and teleports to stay one step ahead of enemies. CAGE MATCH MODE: Use gravity fields and double jumping to your advantage to fight off deadly drones. Use dexterity to your advantage to stay alive. PLAYGROUND MODE: Play with a gravity gun, shoot barrels, destroy breakables and hover around in gravity fields. Follow Arsenal Shock on Steam and check out for media updates!
